titles.title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to permit certain credit repair organizations to dispute credit information directly with a furnisher, and for other purposes.
To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to permit certain credit repair organizations to dispute credit information directly with a furnisher, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill allows a credit repair organization to dispute consumer credit information provided to a credit reporting agency. Under current law, only consumers are allowed to dispute this information.
